When I realized this was an app for iPhone I bought it with all available expansions. It‚Äôs really impressive that you can play this on your phone but developers have stopped updating and adding the new expansions on PC available for IPhone. The TSL Europe and East Asia have not been updated for gathering storm... also TSL Europe looks impressive at first but really there is so much wasted land and nothing but barbarians attacking and destroying civilizations. Not to mention they only allowed for a certain amount of cove to play on it. Anyways still a phone game to pass time but don‚Äôt forget to save because the game crashes a lot so if you plan on starting in ancient times and taking your civ to a next World War. The game will not make it that long. Plus on TSL Europe, civs like Russia get barraged by the barbarians and another civ will swoop in and eliminate. Hopefully iPhone will catch up to PC and I might reevaluate this. At the least allow for mods to be added to iPhone civ 6
This is a full fledged port of the PC game, and no feature is left out. It looks like the Gathering Storm achievements are broken though.
Crashes or freezes before turn 15. Great game, can‚Äôt play it anymore.
The game is overall great and the experience hasn‚Äôt much changed from what it is on PC. However the app stability can be appalling at times

It seems the developers were not prepared (again) for the newest iOS update.  The game constantly crashes  with
Thin one to five turns forcing you to restart the game. This happened before and it took the developers months to fix the issue.  I first thought it was my iPad, but later learned it is a developer issue.  It doesn‚Äôt help that the last update was 12 months ago.
Point is, the developers don‚Äôt care to keep up with iOS updates. The game is great when it works..... ‚Äúwhen‚Äù is the key word.

I loved this game on Xbox years ago. I was excited to download it. Unfortunately I haven‚Äôt even been able to successfully complete one turn as it keeps freezing. So glad I didn‚Äôt purchase the full game right off the bat.

The game freezes up every few turns have yet to get over 10 turns without a total freeze up, to where you have to reboot the iPad.  I have not been able to get through one full game. I updated. Nothing. Save yourself the letdown.

PLEASE FIX THIS

I always choose fredrick barbarosa  to have the  "Hansa" the better and cheaper industrial zone . When you get it on every city you boost all your cities and get great engineers faster which also can boost not only your cities but your wonder building ,cities defenses and on a later stages space race programs you know what great people doüòâmy special strategy
Will update the stars when this gets a fix for sure. For now however I‚Äôm still excited to dive into this, but PLEASE fix this guys. I spend so much more time with my phone than I do anything else.

I love what this game is. I hate how poorly contrived this is on an iOS device. 

Granted, I have an older iPad. But it is running the current iOS (v14.2) with a couple GBs of space. Nonetheless, every time I load into single or multiplayer (cloud-based) it is only a matter of time before the game freezes.  

Essentially, every multi-player turn I have taken has required, on average, 3-5 attempts.  Given the multiple archaic load phases to boot in,  over the course of a week or two I have already given hours of my time to simply trying to complete a single turn multiple times, again and again. 

When I take into account the amount of sheer frustration this experience saddles me with, I have no choice but to give this $20 game 1 star until they make an attempt to actually integrate it with the iOS interface.

title.label: Nice game when it actually works

content.label: Game crashes every couple turns.

Love this game. Had it on my PC in the 90‚Äôs, my PS4 currently, and just paid the $19.99 to download through the App Store for my I-Pad Air 2 operating on iOS 14.2. Every time I play, I don‚Äôt get more than 1-10 turns before it freezes. I‚Äôve restarted, reinstalled, reset my I-Pad, but nothing seems to fix it. Very disappointing. Hopefully this can get fixed. One of my favorite games but it‚Äôs definitely a game ender if it won‚Äôt be fixed.

title.label: Game unplayable on iPad Air 2 with upgrade to iOS 14.1

content.label:
There have always been sporadic freezing issues, but with the new iOS, the game freezes after 2 or 3 turns, and if you restart, it freezes again. Game is currently unplayable on iPad. 

Is there a fix in the works?

Obviously, many other players are registering the same complaint. Is anyone addressing this problem?
